mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPTIONS (OPTIONNO, SIZES, COLOR, SHOESNO) VALUES (OPTION_SEQ.nextval, #{sizes}, #{color}, #{shoesno})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct o.sizes FROM shoes s JOIN category_list cl ON s.shoesno = cl.shoesno JOIN category c ON cl.categoryno = c.categoryno JOIN options o ON s.shoesno = o.shoesno WHERE s.shoesno = #{shoesno} ORDER BY o.sizes

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM options WHERE shoesno = #{shoesno} ORDER BY optionno ASC
